cac:TenderingProcess.cbc:Description: Lot 1 Development and Delivery of Unit 1 Personal Leadership Development Unit – this unit aims to develop the individual leadership potentials of each participant. There is no request for tenderers to provide the physical facilities to deliver the Unit. Lot 2 Development and Delivery of Unit Advanced Leadership Development Unit This unit aims to develop insights into cutting edge leadership understandings and insights into their practical applications in the participants’ professional roles. There is a residential element to this unit, and thus this Lot includes a request for the provision of full-service residential facilities for the delivery of the residential element of this Unit. However, tenderers may request, without prejudice, to tender only for the development and delivery elements, without providing the physical facilities to deliver the Unit. Lot 3 Cross-Boundary Leadership Development Unit This unit aims to develop the participants’ leadership capacity in the specific professional arena, fostering leadership effectiveness across organisational and sectoral boundaries. There is no request for tenderers to provide the physical facilities to deliver the Unit.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Provision of Strategic Leadership Programmes for Senior Public Service Grade and Principal Officer / Public Service Directors Equivalent Grades across the Public Service across three lots
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The provision of Strategic Leadership Programmes for Senior Public Service Grade and Principal Officer / Public Service Directors Equivalent Grades across the Public Service across three lots: Lot 1 Personal Leadership Development Unit Lot 2 Advanced Leadership Development Unit Lot 3 Cross-Boundary Leadership Development Unit All tenders must be submitted via ZIP file

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Tax compliant. Turnover and financial standing. Insurance Pass/fail
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Tax compliant. Turnover €250,000 during each of the last three years and financial standing. Insurance Employer’s Liability €13m Public Liability €6.5m Professional Indemnity €6.5m Cyber Liability €1m

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Personnel and Skills. Technical Resource Required. Previous Experience. Health & Safety. Quality Assurance. Pass/fail
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description:
Personnel - Qualified Trainer/ Facilitator. x2 Researchers/ Content Creators x2 Account Managers x2 Administration Support x2 ICT Support x1
Technical resources - Online Education Platforms Online Resources
